mapper.select: select c.id id, c.title courseName,c.lesson_num lessonNum, c.price price, c.cover url,c.`status` status,s.title parentSubject,su.title subject,t.name teacherName from edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_subject s ON c.parent_subject_id=s.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject su on c.subject_id=su.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id=t.id WHERE c.id=#{id}
